title: An introduction to the republic of Ganzi

sections.title: Capital of Ganzi
sections.content: Litang is the capital of the republic of Ganzi.

sections.title: President of Ganzi
sections.content: Dingzhen is the president of the republic of Ganzi.

sections.title: Vice President of Ganzi
sections.content: Ruike is the vice president of the republic of Ganzi.

sections.title: Industrial of Ganzi
sections.content: The main industry of Ganzi is pipe making.

sections.title: Dingzhen's Pet
sections.content: Zhenzhu the horse is the pet of the president of the republic of Ganzi.

sections.title: Dingzhen's Motto
sections.content: It's the mother who give me life.
